FuncDef: The reset ospfv3 counters maxage-lsa command resets MaxAge Router LSA statistics.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an OSPFv3 process ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To reset OSPFv3 processes, run the reset ospfv3 command. If a device does not send all the LSAs within the set time, other devices still store invalid LSAs.
